imdb.plot outline: Step into the world of the overweight. Their weight affects the way they walk, interact, rest, play, and how they see the world. Some don't leave home for months. Some don't have jobs and can't function without assistance. Others have made a fortune running plus-size brands and dating websites. Explore the reasons they got to where they are, and why the obesity problem continues to get bigger.
imdb.title: Supersized
